TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EmphasisBreak extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values for lengths of between spoken words.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The break emphasis is set for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
Each synthetic speech engine is free to determine how to render breaks between words; the nature of emphasis differs between languages, dialects, genders, or voices.
Both <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> may be used when setting or getting the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instance.
The two values may be distinguished by the fact that the actual values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> are all less than zero and values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord> are greater than or equal to zero; and by using the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on an instance. From more information, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>,and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>.

.field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak Medium = int32(-4)

.field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak Strong = int32(-5)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak Weak = int32(-3)
